public: Microsoft::Build::Construction::ProjectMetadataElement ^ AddMetadata(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ unevaluatedValue, bool expressAsAttribute);

param.name: name
param.span: 要添加的元数据的名称

span.span: The name of the metadata to add
The value of the metadata to add

param.name: expressAsAttribute
param.span: 如果为 true，则元数据将表示为属性而不是子元素，例如，<Reference Include="Libary.dll" HintPath="..\lib\Library.dll" Private="True" />

span.span: If true, then the metadata will be expressed as an attribute instead of a child element, for example <Reference Include="Libary.dll" HintPath="..\lib\Library.dll" Private="True" />
